attributes.review: it is a complete scam. when i downloaded the app, it told me to enter my mobile number. when i did, my screen went black and i haven’t been able to access most of the things on my phone. an alert came up trying to get my private information and credit card number. DO NOT DOWNLOAD YOU WILL GET HACKED!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: When I opened the app it sucked my dog into the phone and I watched as that Cheeto man stabbed poor Walmart(mi doggo) to death and then I saw those  little tiny hands🤢so I decided to call Hillary Clinton and ask if he actually built that wall with them baby doll hands🤮🤔and she said no😵 so then my phone flew away and i am currently typing on a microwave 🤡 so yah.
attributes.title: This app killed my dog🤦🏾‍♀️.

attributes.review: DO NOT RECOMMEND. I’ve already been losing brain cells having to see this Cheeto on the news explaining politics worse than a three yo (no offense to three year olds I respect yall) and now he’s asking for my PHONE NUMBER to send me even worse messages. I do NOT want to be spammed by this orange disgusting racist misogynistic homophobic privileged white man with a flying wig. 🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢🤮🤮
attributes.title: Waste of brain cells

attributes.review:
I went on his page and saw so much false information about black lives matter and SO many other things 

When I tried to quote and comment and share the app always lagged out and would take me back to my home screen page. It would also bug my screen and the audio would be scratched

Finally, the details are horrible. Their is few information, and the information that they have is false.

Please take this app down. It’s not worth it don’t waste your time downloading
attributes.title: false information/ laggy/ few details

attributes.review: this app is so bad! it broke my phone and also crashed my car and said derogatory things about women, black people, the LGBTQ+ community, and every other minority!! it doesn’t care about anything but taking my money and molesting children! pls consider sending it back where it came from at ur earliest convenience
attributes.title: terrible!!

attributes.review: My poor phone had to see the Cheeto, you know what the cheeto looks better and honestly i need bleach for my eyes right now, it was a very disturbing image that no human should see. We need to delete this app of the App Store asap bc it is very traumatizing to whoever downloads it and can cause mental health problems,as for me i am still recovering😔✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: No👁👄👁

attributes.review: I was a very big trump supporter but when i downloaded this app, i was absolutely revolted with it. First off, you open it and there is a very graphic picture of a cheeto working out. Next, that picture is followed by disgusting almost naked pics. I feel very betrayed and like i need to throw up! Please don’t download!!
attributes.title: I cant believe this app

attributes.review: When I Forster got this app I thought it was a game so ofc I was interested. But when I opened it, it had said “keep America great” which is kind of weird since as of right now America is NOT great. Since all the police brutality and innocent black lives being taken away. So I immediately un-installed the app and I am now leaving this review. 😌✨
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to be enlightened, when signing up they asked me for my address which I thought was scary but nothing abnormal. As soon as I leave my house to go out someone pulled up to house yelled “this is from mr trump” poured hot coffee on me shaved my head and forced my parents to get a divorce in front of me, if I could rate this lower, I would.
attributes.title: Worst trauma

attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch. Of course I had to throw it away but it won’t leave me alone. It kept flying all over my house. Next thing I know I get a notification from the app and says the Cheeto man will visits in a couple of minutes. Heard someone knock and it was him. Good thing I had a hammer on me. Never saw him since then
